Tables.table: Table 5: Comparative results with and without co-reference rules

Figures.figure: Figure 2 shows an Attack Target event template for the sentence "an Iraqi warplane attacked the frigate Stark with missiles May 17, 1987. "

Figure 3 illustrates the REES system architecture. REES consists of three main components: a tagging component (cf. Section 2.1), a co-reference resolution module (cf. Section 2.2), and a template generation module (cf. Section 2.3). Figure 3 also illustrates that the user may run REES from a Graphical User Interface (GUI) called TemplateTool (cf. Section 2.4).
